TopicTitle: Sigma Dimensions doesn't work at all

Articles.Content:
I'm using ksp 1.4.5 with OPM and Sigma Dimensions and also other mods...

When i try to load ksp with Sigma Dimensions installed, it says that kopernicus couldn't load the planet pack, i have reinstalled sigma dimensions, even tried it without OPM and it still happens. I tried also reconfiguring Sigma Dimensions settings.cfg multiple times, i even tried loading it without configuring the settings.cfg file

 

I'm using module manager 4.0.3 and Sigma Dimensions 0.10.0

 

Heres a image of my GameData folder

https://imgur.com/a/dV4eDQv

Module Manager logs...

https://www.dropbox.com/s/j4iqbv5gic2wnk4/ModuleManager.rar?dl=0

Kopernicus Logs...

https://www.dropbox.com/s/67gv68xvk97fif2/Logs-Kopernicus.zip?dl=0

 

Can anybody help me fix this? 

 

My output log

https://www.dropbox.com/s/lvqrip3x0gxtihh/output_log.txt?dl=0

Edited January 7, 2020 by idkwhattochooseausername

I'm using ksp 1.4.5 with OPM and Sigma Dimensions and also other mods...

When i try to load ksp with Sigma Dimensions installed, it says that kopernicus couldn't load the planet pack, i have reinstalled sigma dimensions, even tried it without OPM and it still happens. I tried also reconfiguring Sigma Dimensions settings.cfg multiple times, i even tried loading it without configuring the settings.cfg file

https://www.dropbox.com/s/lvqrip3x0gxtihh/output_log.txt?dl=0

The Module Manager you are using is version 4.0.3, you may want to consider downgrading the version.

In the kopernicus files, it appears that Moho isn't loading for some reason. Can you send me a copy of the file that re configures Moho? The Kopernicus log throws  the exception in the Mods Section of the File, so it is probably a problem with the PQS.

Sigma Dimensions isn't even showing up at all in the log!

Edited January 7, 2020 by DunaManiac

14 minutes ago, DunaManiac said:

The Module Manager you are using is version 4.0.3, you may want to consider downgrading the version.

In the kopernicus files, it appears that Moho isn't loading for some reason. Can you send me a copy of the file that re configures Moho? The Kopernicus log throws  the exception in the Mods Section of the File, so it is probably a problem with the PQS.

Sigma Dimensions isn't even showing up at all in the log!

I have downgraded it to 4.0.2 but i still get the same issue. I haven't installed anything else than sigma dimensions when i wanted to rescale my game and when i launch without it, it doesn't give me moho issue

SD v0.10.0 was for KSP 1.7.3 so it's not sure that it would work on 1.7.5

you are using Kopernicus 1.4.5-17 but that is a backport that was not available at the time SD was released, so it could be the reason why it breaks

I would suggest you to use 1.4.5-4 but I cannot be certain it will work since this was a long time ago

 

EDIT:

I just tested 

KSP 1.4.5
Kopernicus 1.4.5-4
MM 3.0.7
SD 0.10.0

with this setup SD works
